resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/103089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>103089</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Microblogology</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Microblogology</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Six Science bloggers talk about why they blog, the role of blogging in science, feedback they've received, and the greatest microbiological discovery in the past decade.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sechs Wissenschaft bloggers befassen, sich mit 
warum sie blog, die Rolle von Blogging in der Wissenschaft, Feedback 
sie empfangen haben, und die größte mikrobiologische Entdeckung in 
der letzten Dekade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Six bloggers de la Science parlent de pourquoi ils
le blog, le rôle de blogging dans la science, feedback ils ont reçu,
et la plus grande découverte microbiologique dans la décennie 
passée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conversa de seis bloggers da ciência 
aproximadamente porque o blog, o papel de blogging na ciência, 
feedback elas receberam, e a descoberta microbiological a mais grande 
na década passada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sei bloggers di scienza parlano di perchè blog, 
il ruolo di blogging nella scienza, risposte hanno ricevuto e la 
scoperta microbiologica più grande nella decade passata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έξι bloggers επιστήμης μιλούν για γιατί αυτοί 
blog, ο ρόλος στην επιστήμη, ανατροφοδότηση they've 
λαμβανόμενη, και η μέγιστη μικροβιολογική ανακάλυψη στην 
προηγούμενη δεκαετία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Seis bloggers de la ciencia hablan de porqué el 
blog, el papel de blogging en la ciencia, feedback ellos han recibido,
y el descubrimiento microbiológico más grande de la última década.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:MICROBEWORLD
FN:MICROBEWORLD
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101417</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>103089</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/microblogology</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
